phrs.translation: 无监视的, 不受监控的
无监视的控制系统, 开关控制系统

sentences.translation: 这是一个自动更新帐号。

sentences.sentence: There has been criticism that, like metal detectors, many closed-circuit cameras don't work or go unmonitored.
sentences.translation: 有人批评说，如金属探测器、许多闭路摄像机都不能正常工作或去监测。

sentences.sentence: In many places the rules are simply ignored. Illegal fishing thrives, landings go unmonitored, skippers keep two sets of logbooks, officials are bribed.
sentences.translation: 在很多地方规章完全被忽视，非法捕鱼猖獗，码头无人监管，船长存有两套航海日志，正式的一套是买通有关人员编造的。
